name: Brutal Defense
description:
The towers

  • Ice tower (slows down enemies)
  • Arrow tower (causes internal bleeding)
  • Poison tower (can fire poisonous projectiles)
  • Cannon tower (short range, heavy damage +splash damage)
  • Fire tower (slow attack speed heavy fire damage)

Different types of damage 

  • Poison
  • Blunt
  • Piercing
  • Ice
  • Fire

Enemies have unique stats (damage resistance, speed) and abilities such as

  • Healing aura
  • Resurrecting friendly units
  • Attack speed boost
